question:
Rajya Sabha mein 'Operation Sindoor' par debate kin ministers dwara ki gayi thi?
Which ministers led the debate on 'Operation Sindoor' in Rajya Sabha?

Opposition ka walkout kis event ke dauran hua?
During which event did the Opposition walk out of Rajya Sabha?

options.A: A. PM Modi ke absence par Operation Sindoor debate

question:
Rajya Sabha mein election commissioner officers ke prati threats ko lekar debate kyun mangi gayi?
Why was a debate called in Rajya Sabha concerning threats to Election Commission officers?

options.A: A. To discuss constitutional autonomy of EC
options.B: B. To endorse state government authority over EC
options.D: D. To support intimidation of EC officials

question:
वित्तीय सुरक्षा से संबंधित कानून सुझाव देना कौनसा बिल था जिसे Rajya Sabha ne pass kiya?
Which amendment bill related to financial security (banking nominees) was passed in the Rajya Sabha recently?

options.D: D. Digital Personal Data Protection Act

question:
Rajya Sabha mein '264 questions deleted' ka mudda kis incident se juda hai?
The issue of '264 questions deleted' in the Rajya Sabha is associated with which incident?

options.A: A. Suspension of opposition MPs after Parliament breach
options.B: B. Introduction of Women's Reservation Bill
options.C: C. Delay in One Nation One Election Bills

question:

Which Rajya Sabha leader criticised Opposition over Indus Waters Treaty stance and said some are 'uncomfortable with history'?

Opposition demanded whose presence which led to a walkout when he did not respond?
